column1: #Text=# learning-generality  Code for the paper 'Why Deep Learning Generalizes' which may be found \[here\](https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.09639).
#Text=Gradient splitting is fairly straightforward to implement as gradients are additive.
#Text=For implementation of equation (1) in the paper linked, see `cifar10\_generalization.py` and for equations (4) and (5) see `objective\_generalization.py`.
